mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(id, parent_id, category_id, user_id, type_id, title, body, state, is_hide, is_complete, is_anonymous, created_at, modified_at, comment_cnt, like_cnt, report_cnt) VALUES(#{parentId}, #{categoryId}, #{userId}, #{typeId}, #{title}, #{body}, #{state}, #{isHide}, #{isComplete}, #{isAnonymous}, #{createAt}, #{modifiedAt}, #{commentCnt}, #{likeCnt}, #{reportCnt})
